mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_PW , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE1 , USER_PHONE2 , USER_PHONE3 , USER_ADDR1 , USER_ADDR2 , USER_COMPANY , CREATOR , CREATE_TIME , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_TIME FROM USER_INFO WHERE SESSIONKEY LIKE #{SESSIONID} AND SESSIONLIMIT > SYSDATE

SELECT USER_ID , USER_PW , USER_NAME , USER_PHONE1 , USER_PHONE2 , USER_PHONE3 , USER_ADDR1 , USER_ADDR2 , USER_COMPANY , CREATOR , CREATE_TIME , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_TIME , SESSIONKEY , SESSIONLIMIT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , CODE_TYPE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , TOTAL_CNT , BOARD_HITS , CREATE_TIME , BOARD_REF , BOARD_STEP , BOARD_LEV , CREATOR FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , CODE_TYPE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT , BOARD_HITS , BOARD.CREATE_TIME , BOARD_REF , BOARD_LEV , BOARD_STEP , BOARD.CREATOR FROM BOARD JOIN COM_CODE ON BOARD.BOARD_TYPE = COM_CODE.CODE_ID ORDER BY BOARD_REF DESC, BOARD_STEP ASC ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN #{startRow } AND #{endRow }
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD

SELECT COM_CODE.CODE_ID , COM_CODE.CODE_NAME , BOARD.BOARD_TYPE , BOARD.BOARD_NUM , BOARD.BOARD_TITLE , BOARD.BOARD_COMMENT , BOARD.BOARD_REF , BOARD.BOARD_LEV , BOARD.BOARD_STEP , BOARD.CREATOR , BOARD.CREATE_TIME , BOARD.FILE_ROOT , BOARD.FILE_SIZE FROM BOARD JOIN COM_CODE ON BOARD.BOARD_TYPE = COM_CODE.CODE_ID WHERE BOARD.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType } AND BOARD.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum }

SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_WRITER , FILE_NUM , FILE_GROUP , FILE_ORG_NAME , FILE_SAVE_NAME , FILE_TYPE , POST_FILE_TABLE.FILE_SIZE , FILE_PATH , FILE_REG_DTTM , BOARD.BOARD_NUM , BOARD.BOARD_TYPE FROM POST_FILE_TABLE JOIN BOARD ON POST_FILE_TABLE.BOARD_NUM = BOARD.BOARD_NUM WHERE BOARD.BOARD_TYPE = #{fileGroup } AND BOARD.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum }

INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_COMMENT , CREATOR , CREATE_TIME , MODIFIER , MODIFIED_TIME , BOARD_HITS , BOARD_REF , BOARD_STEP , BOARD_LEV , FILE_ROOT ) VALUES ( #{boardType } , (SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType }) , #{boardTitle } , #{boardComment } , #{creator } , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , 'SYSTEM' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '0' , (SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType }) , '0' , '0' , #{fileRoot, jdbcType=VARCHAR } )
SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , CODE_TYPE FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID , CODE_NAME , CODE_TYPE FROM COM_CODE )
